amongUs.title: Among Us Party
amongUs.description: Play Among Us in real life! This app assigns Impostor and Crewmate roles secretly to each player using a PIN system. Track scores across multiple rounds.

shipwrecker.title: Shipwrecker
shipwrecker.description: A naval battle game where you sink enemy ships. Test your strategic skills on the high seas!

bingoParty.title: Bingo Party
bingoParty.description: Classic bingo game for parties and gatherings. Generate cards and play with friends!

stopParty.title: Stop Party
stopParty.description: The classic categories game! Race against friends to fill categories with words starting with a random letter.
